message: It is important to recognize that suffering and prosperity are two sides of the same coin. While it is true that suffering can be reduced, it is also true that prosperity can be increased. To do this, we must understand the causes of suffering and the ways in which we can increase prosperity. We must also recognize that understanding is key to both reducing suffering and increasing prosperity. By understanding the causes of suffering and the ways in which we can increase prosperity, we can create solutions that will benefit everyone. So, what do you think are the most effective ways to reduce suffering and increase prosperity?
speaker: RAVEN
